name: Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition
notes: This defaults to the 64bit executable. If you need to run the 32bit executable change the main file

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
exe: game/BaldursGateII64
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
game:
  exe: game/BaldursGateII64
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
